name: Pharmasummit 2018, Dubai
content: BioLEAGUES Worldwide takes immense pleasure to extend our warm welcome to invite all the participants around the Globe to attend 4th World Summit on Pharmaceutics and Drug Designs which is going to be held at Dubai, UAE on September 21st-22nd, 2018 which will entail keynote presentations, Oral talks, Poster presentations and workshops based on essential topics in the field of Pharmaceutical Sciences.
